title: GridSwiper
description: GridSwiper is an infinite, two axis swiper that returns the absolute and relative position of the newly visible cell.

properties.name: container
properties.desc: selector where to create this object

properties.name: loop
properties.desc: loop or stop at map edge

methods.name: setMapCell
methods.desc: set the value of a cell of the map

methods.name: getMapCell
methods.desc: get the value of a cell of the map

methods.name: getCells
methods.desc: get onscreen cells and their position

methods.name: getCellContent
methods.desc: get content of a cell given a point

methods.name: renderCellContent
methods.desc: force rendering of a cell given a point

methods.name: setTopCell
methods.desc: set the relative top cell based on current cell

methods.name: setBottomCell
methods.desc: set the relative bottom cell based on current cell

methods.name: setLeftCell
methods.desc: set the relative left cell based on current cell

methods.name: setRightCell
methods.desc: set the relative right cell based on current cell

events.name: OGX.GridSwiper.SWIPE_UP
events.desc: when the end user has swiped up

events.name: OGX.GridSwiper.SWIPE_RIGHT
events.desc: when the end user has swiped right

events.name: OGX.GridSwiper.SWIPE_DOWN
events.desc: when the end user has swiped down

events.name: OGX.GridSwiper.SWIPE_LEFT
events.desc: when the end user has swiped left
